name: sleepTimer_setValue
description: This function is used to set a sleep timer for a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the sleep timer.

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description: The duration in minutes for the sleep timer.
